title: Microsoft Arc Touch Mouse Review
description:
The Microsoft Arc Touch Mouse was released to accompany the Microsoft Surface product line. the mouse is lightweight and folds flat making it easy to pack away with your tablet or laptop. the great design makes it the perfect shape when in the Arc mode and feels perfect in your hand, great for lefties or righties, and the features and customisation's are great too.

Buy yours here... http://amzn.to/2uir30j
